steps.conclusion: One title violates the no-level/joiner rule: "Fundamentos de Programação" uses the banned term "Fundamentos" (fundamentals). Its english_title "Programming Fundamentals" also mirrors this banned level term. The canonical mapping for this vague input should include "Programação" rather than a fundamentals variant.

The icon "tabler-بيوتر" contains non-Latin characters; while it starts with "tabler-" as required, it may be unusual, though not disallowed. Everything else meets constraints: titles are in Portuguese, single-topic, <=5 words, proper english_title translations for the other items, is_language_course is false.

Replace "Fundamentos de Programação" with "Programação" and set english_title to "Programming". Optionally consider adding another relevant single-topic suggestion like "Desenvolvimento Mobile" or "Dados" if more breadth is desired, but not necessary.
